alert.note: Alert for Baraga (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 10:15PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to as high as 20 inches, greatest over the Huron Mountains to Herman to Alberta. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Baraga County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions will be possible at times tonight into early Saturday morning, especially closer to Lake Superior. Additional lake enhanced to lake effect snowfall is expected Saturday night into Sunday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
